Restore color to a world drained of life by conquering 56 challenging levels!
description:
Super Slime Boy – Bring Color Back to a World Drained of Life!

Step into the squishy form of Super Slime Boy, a small but determined hero, in this fast-paced, precision platformer set in a dangerous, black-and-white world where every mistake means instant death. Armed with nothing but your reflexes and skill, your mission is simple yet challenging: Survive deadly obstacles and restore the stolen colors to the world.

The once vibrant land has been drained of its colors, leaving behind a harsh, monochrome environment filled with buzzing saw blades, razor-sharp spikes, and unforgiving platforming challenges. As you guide Slime Boy through this treacherous world, each successful level breathes color back into the environment, symbolizing your progress and triumph over darkness.

Key Features:

Precision Platforming:
Navigate through 56 handcrafted levels designed to test your timing, reflexes, and patience.
Every level is a puzzle of movement, requiring pixel-perfect jumps and split-second reactions.

Race Against Time:
Every level challenges you to beat the clock and earn Bronze, Silver, or Gold trophies based on your completion time.
Master your routes and perfect your speedruns to unlock new stages and show off your skills.

Restore the World’s Colors:
With every level completed, the grayscale world slowly regains its colors.
Each success brings a visual reward, transforming the bleak environment into a place of life and energy.

7 Unique Stages, 56 Levels:
The journey spans 7 distinct stages, each with 8 progressively challenging levels.
Unlock new stages by collecting points from trophies, and open the path to the ultimate test of your platforming mastery.

Instant Restarts – No Waiting:
Failure is part of the journey.
Die, learn, and restart instantly—there’s no waiting, no loading screens, just you and the challenge ahead.


What Awaits You?

Every level is a challenge.
Every jump is a risk.
Every second counts.

Will you have the precision, patience, and determination to bring color back to this lifeless world?
Or will you fall victim to the countless traps that await?

The challenge is set—are you ready to help Super Slime Boy restore life to his world?
